entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • File-scoped namespace puts semicolon on newline if a comment exists #56232
  • Running roslyn tests on a checked build of the runtime #56231
  • Pattern-matching can be O(2^n) to compile for some kinds of switches #56230
  • Member selection dialog for Pull Members Up, Extract Base Class, and Move Static Members should warn if dependents aren't selected #56226
  • When a C# compiler unit-test is executed after a compiler change in Roslyn solution, the test is executed against old compiler bits #56219
  • Partial simple program doesn't apply any attributes on `Main` method #56217
  • roslyn Code generators having issues when using external dependencies,. ex: Newtonsoft.Json #56216

Closed

  • CS0220 on uint.MaxValue + (nuint)42 #51714
    17.0
  • The "Change namespace to match folder structure" refactoring duplicates the root namespace #56220
  • Provide real implementation for AssemblySymbol.RuntimeSupportsStaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces #53800
    17.0
  • Some msbuild properties get corrupted before being passed to Roslyn analyzers #56180
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Include ref info for parameters > 16 in synthesized delegate type name #56233
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Merge all source generator state in CompilationTracker into a helper type. #56229
    Area-IDE
  • Update VS SDK references #56228
    Area-IDE
  • Stop marking main-vs-deps insertion PR as draft #56227
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid telemetry for unavoidable XmlException #56221
    Area-IDE
  • Eliminate 75GB allocations during binding in a performance trace #56218
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56192
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Rework our netstandard1.3 test references #56223
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix doubleclick for Value Tracking #56188
    Area-IDE, Feature - IDE Value Tracking, Next
  • Native Int: constant folding is executed at runtime rather than compile-time if the result depends on the size of native integers #56145
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't try to rename references in source generated files #56189
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove the HasCompilation flag. #56132
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56193
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Provide real implementation for RuntimeSupportsStaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces property. #56173
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • More options refactoring #56089
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56210
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • New feature: Detect variable swaps and suggest using the new tuple-idiomatic-form if available. #56215
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, 17.1
  • Add readme.md listing breaking changes doc chronologically #56019
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Add External Access options for TypeScript #56187
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56235
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move VS lsp client implementation to EditorFeatures for VSMac #56051
    Area-IDE
  • Remove declaration-only-compilation from CompilationTracker #56139
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • Use bulk unsubscribe operations in FileChangeWatcher #55890
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56209
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Initial fix for issue "VB Formatting of LineContinuation Wrong after _ ' Comment" #54559
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Fix crashes in some nullable error scenarios #56190
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Support implicit conversions of lambda expressions to LambdaExpression #56200
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
